pages.text: As of Amethyst Imbuement 1.20.1-17, there is a radial menu for changing spells! Press the [Left Alt] key (by default) to open the menu, and click to select the spell current highlighted by the indicator arrow.

pages.title: Sniper Bow Scope
pages.text: If you want to configure the radial menu, see the $(l:amethyst_imbuement:scrolls/spell_commands#radial_menu)Spell Commands$() entry for more details.
